serversettings.name: Lightouse USA Debug Barotrauma Server
serversettings.ServerMessage:
////INCOMING TRANSMISSION//// DWELLERS OF EUROPA!
We are the Watchdogs and we are looking for new and experienced souls to take voyage into the deepest waters of the planet Europa.
You will be led by Captain Keeves through these deep depths.
Our objective is not fame...we do not seek glory. The Watchdogs follow the currents such as we do our morals.
We go where we are needed and we go where we are paid.
Follow the Captain....and you just might make a fine mercenary.
Our departure window is closing soon, so come on down and join the us for a journey of a lifetime before its too late.
Welcome to the Watchdogs recruit!
//A FEW IMPORTANT RULES FROM THE CAPTAIN//
1. Any and all injuries sustained on this voyage not be held against the Captain. (NO INSURANCE)
2. Security will be the only ones to hold weapons. Any and other weapons found will be held in the gun compartment. (UNTIL SAID OTHERWISE)
3. MEDICINES and MEDICAL EQUIPMENT are for Certified Medical Doctors.
4. Security MUST have communication!
5. Finally, disrespect/discrimination towards Captain and other crew members WILL NOT BE TOLERATED.
//END TRANSMISSION//
